title: ANF seizes 40 kg drugs in two operations
content:
RAWALPINDI, Aug 13 (APP):Anti-Narcotics Force (ANF) while conducting two operations managed to recover 40 kg drugs and arrested three accused, said an ANF Headquarters spokesman here on Tuesday.
He informed that 1.4 kg ice was recovered from a passenger going to Doha from Peshawar Airport.
In second operation, 39 kg hashish was recovered from a vehicle intercepted near Shikarpur Road Sukkur and two suspects were arrested. Cases under the Anti-Narcotics Act have been registered against the arrested accused and further investigations are under process
